name: Arcane Farmer
description:
Arcane Farmer is a game about the balance between, the spiritual world and the physical. As a wizard in a forest, you're there to build a farm that benefits you in selling products and pleasing the spirits. 

This is an early prototype released for the 11th Pirate Software Game Jam.

Controls:

[WASD] - Movement

[Left Shift] - Sprint

[Tab] - Inventory

[Escape] - Pause menu, this will  also close any open UI such as the inventory.

[Mouse left button] - Whilst having a hotbar item selected.

[Mouse scroll] - Cycles to the next hotbar item.

[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6] - Manually selects a hotbar slot.

Controls can be seen in-game at any given time, by viewing the Pause Menu!

Side Note:

Sadly, we ran out of time to implement any automation or audio, however, the base concept for...

- Farming,

- Using items, interacting with objects.

- Crafting requirements (such as repairing the shrine).

- Effecting the world using 'Magical' abilities, such as cultivating land!
